answers.answer: She may be experiencing some type of food intolerance issue. You may want to suggest that she keep a food diary and track what she's eating and what happens/symptoms. If she can pin down a specific food, or food group that causing the bloating/gas and deletes that from her diet things may calm down a lot.

question: My sister is 18 now and she was diagnosed with type 1 diabetes 4 years ago. She is on insulin.  She has a regular problem of abdominal distention. Whenever she eats, either less or large, she gets trouble with her stomach, it blows up, has pain while walking in stomach, constipation type symptoms. Number of visits had been made to different gastroenterologists, but none of them was able to help her out with this problem. Kindly suggest regarding this.
title: Abdominal distension
